exercises.question: Which structure is used for a fixed arrangement with a specific time?
You ______ ever share your One-Time Password (OTP) with anyone.
This digital wallet is the ______ one available in the app store.
I have ______ my portfolio since I started my new job.
They are ______ to apply for a higher credit limit next month.
A ______ email often looks like it's from a real bank but it's fake.
There ______ any fees on my statement yesterday.
How ______ yield did your investments generate last year?
We have held these ETFs ______ five years.
Monthly payments for a loan are called ______.
What is the name of the digital protocol for secure online payments?
Have you ______ used a robo-advisor for your wealth management?
The security consultant ______ at the fintech firm every Monday.
This BNPL service is ______ than traditional credit cards.
They ______ at the cybersecurity conference last Tuesday.
A ______ tracks a specific index like the S&P 500.
I ______ never been late with my monthly installments.
You ______ follow the KYC (Know Your Customer) procedures.
What is the maximum amount of credit you can use?
How ______ have you been using biometrics for login?
I have ______ (be) a user of this neobank since 2019.
You ______ (must/mustn't) reveal your PIN at the ATM.
This is the ______ (secure) payment method in our app.
We ______ ______ (launch) the new virtual card this Friday.
A ______ is a numerical representation of your credit reliability.
I ______ (not / review) my monthly statement yet.
The ______ ______ (two words) is the annual cost of borrowing.
Was the transfer successful? No, it ______.
He has held those shares ______ (for/since) ten years.
If you suspect fraud, you must ______ (freeze) your card.
There ______ (be) several transactions on my account yesterday.
I ______ ______ (start) an investment plan next month.
An ______ uses algorithms to help you invest your savings.
Has she ______ (pay) the final installment of her loan?
The ______ ______ (two words) allows you to pay without interest for 30 days.
We ______ (not / have) enough balance for the transfer.
Digital assets are often ______ (volatile) than traditional stocks.
I have ______ (have) this diversified portfolio for a long time.
The ______ icon in the browser indicates an encrypted connection.
The bank managers ______ (be) very helpful during the onboarding.
have / I / used / neobank / since / 2020 / a
exercises.answer: I have used a neobank since 2020

exercises.question: must / you / sharing / avoid / credentials / your
exercises.answer: you must avoid sharing your credentials

exercises.question: is / my / what / score / credit / ?
launching / the / are / we / app / tomorrow
exercises.answer: we are launching the app tomorrow

exercises.question: not / they / paid / have / dividends / last / since / July
exercises.answer: they have not paid dividends since last July

exercises.question: is / investment / the / ETF / best / this
exercises.answer: this is the best ETF investment

exercises.question: he / working / is / in / department / compliance / the
exercises.answer: he is working in the compliance department

exercises.question: any / were / fees / there / your / on / statement / ?
exercises.answer: were there any fees on your statement ?

exercises.question: going / we / are / a / to / BNPL / use / service
exercises.answer: we are going to use a BNPL service
